Events.PreEventString: On top of a pedestal, there's a $1.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: A $1 is protecting the area, it sees you as a threat to the Sky Castle.
Events.PostEventString: You defeated the guardian and took its $1 as a prize.

Events.PreEventString: A $1 is protecting the area, it sees you as a threat to the Sky Castle.
Events.PostEventString: You defeated the guardian and took its $1 as a prize.

Events.PreEventString: Floating in the air, a huge shining crystal talks to you: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
You reach an area where the temperature is warmer and the air is pure.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: You can't believe your eyes. You have found the famed fountain of life.
Events.PostEventString: Before you can react, $1 leaps and drinks from it. It is fully healed.

Events.PreEventString: You reach an area where the temperature is warmer and the air is pure.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from harmful conditions.

Events.PreEventString: Like bubbles in the air, you see unripe leppa berries floating. It is a bizarre sight.
Events.PostEventString: You and your Pokemon eat some of them. Their moves recover some PP.

Events.PreEventString: A group of baby pokemon are looking at you. They've never seen a human before, and they're terrified. They decide to attack you, hopefully their last stand will protect their home.
Events.PostEventString: You have succesfully defeated the babies.

Events.PreEventString: You can't believe your eyes. You have found the famed fountain of life.
Events.PostEventString: You approach it, but it was a trap, your Pokemon fall into a pitfall trap, and sustain some damage.

Events.PreEventString: As you climb, the environment becomes more hostile. The low temperatures are extremely dangerous.
Events.PostEventString: You try your best, but the harsh temperature have affected $1, it is now frozen.

Events.PreEventString: The walls of the castle contain a lot of ancient texts and tablets. No one truly knows the significance of these texts.
Events.PostEventString: You pick up a $1 that was embedded on a wall. Only a small fraction of the vast knowledge found in this place.

Events.PreEventString: You enter a set of ruins unlike all previous ones. This one contains weird glypths embedded in the walls. Suddenly, the glyphs come alive and start attacking!.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You can walk through the clouds in this area, but they won't support much weight. Try to make sure you can lower your party's weight somehow.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 allows the party to be light enough, you can take the shortcut through the clouds.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see the end of the sky castle in the distance. You clearly can't make it across from here, but a dragon Pokemon flying nearby seems friendly, you may be able to get it's attention and ask it for help.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 made the dragon happy. The dragon is now happy to give you a hand.

Floors.ShortcutClue: This is the end of the line. No more shortcuts ahead.

BossEvent.PreEventString: You face against $1, the guardian of the Sky Castle. It's clearly angry thet you're trespassing it's territory, but also curious that you made it so far.
BossEvent.PostEventString: The guardian flies away. For a second, there's not a sound in the air. You're so high up that you can even see the curvature of the earth. But now it's time to return home.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: The air is cold and thin, you can hardly breathe. This is a hostile land, not meant for humans and Pokemon from the surface. You should use any opportunity you can to have a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But for now it's time to move on...
